data.content:
Handoff capsule (2026-02-20, final): Executed maintainer-approved continuation to resolve sync divergence by preserving and publishing local Beads state. Committed/pushed Beads sync commits to origin/main: 82c870f (config + issues sync after doctor) and 69ddb4b (persist verification labels update). Ran bd sync before pushes; pushes succeeded to origin/main. Current custom Dolt hooks remain installed for pre-push/post-merge/post-checkout (v0.55.1 custom behavior) with backups in .git/hooks/*.bak-*.

Post-fix health: bd doctor now reports 67 passed / 2 warnings / 0 errors. Remaining warnings are operational only: git working tree has untracked .beads-backups/ and beads_integration_0_55_1.md, and Dolt lock health warns on lock-file presence after bd operations. Stale lock files were moved non-destructively to /Users/cartine/foolery/.beads-backups/locks-20260220-174254/.

Current local workspace status:
- clean tracked files on main (no modified tracked files)
- untracked: .beads-backups/
- untracked: beads_integration_0_55_1.md
